about_the_game:
DEMO VERSION

You've been a skeletal warrior of Hell for eons, and you've never wavered no matter the task. However, on a seemingly normal blazing hot day, a super cute cat appears out of nowhere! You know this pure adorable creature doesn't belong in this place. You resolve yourself to escort this cat out of Hell and back to whence it came!

This is an action game with rogue-like elements: permanent death and random level generation, with upgrades you can get as you go. As the difficulty ramps up the further you get through hell, there will also be elements of bullet-hell. Steel your mind, warrior! You will be able to upgrade your defenses, your attacks, your speed, and more as you fight your cat's way to freedom. Try not to go Catboy Crazy!

Features: Super cute hand drawn art by my friend!
